(Simplified: 鹬)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 矞 indicates the sound; 鳥 (bird) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 矞 [ yù ] to bore with an awl; bright, charming
    • 鳥 [ niǎo ] bird
①鳥，羽毛茶褐色，嘴、腳都很長，趾間無蹼，常在水邊或田野中捕喫小魚、小蟲和貝類：鷸蚌相爭，漁翁得利。
鷸蚌相爭 [ yù bàng xiāng zhēng ]: lit. sandpiper and clam war together (and the fisherman catches both) (idiom); fig. neighbors who can't agree lose out to a third party

鷸字的基本解释

鷸
yù
见“鹬”。

鷸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yù］
［《廣韻》餘律切，入術，以。］
“鹬1”的繁体字。
(1)水鸟名。体色暗淡，喙细长，腿亦长，趾间没有蹼。常栖田泽，捕食小鱼及昆虫。是一种候鸟。天将雨即鸣。
(2)翠鸟的别名。
(3)今为鹬科多种鸟的通称。有时也专指鹬属各种鸟。常见的有丘鹬、细嘴滨鹬、乌脚滨鹬、三趾鹬、阔嘴鹬等。
(4)疾飞貌。
[②]［shù］
“鹬2”的繁体字。
见“鷸2子”。

鷸字的康熙字典解释

【亥集中】【鳥字部】　鷸； 康熙笔画：23； 页码：页1501第16
【廣韻】餘律切【集韻】允律切【韻會】【正韻】以律切，?音聿。【說文】鷸，知天將雨鳥也。知天文者冠鷸。陳藏器云：鷸如鶉，色蒼喙長，在泥塗。邨民云：田鷄所化。【戰國策】蘇秦曰：鷸蚌相持。又一種翠鳥曰鷸。【爾雅·釋鳥】翠鷸。【郭註】似燕，紺色，生鬰林。【疏】李巡曰：鷸，一名翠，其羽可以爲飾。又一種，赤足，黃文，曰鷸。【左傳·僖二十四年】鄭子臧好聚鷸冠，是也。又【正韻】疾飛貌。【木華·海賦】鷸如驚鳧之失侶。又【集韻】食律切，音術。【廣雅】鶙鵳鷸子籠脫鷂也。【曹憲註】鷸音述。驚字原刻从敬从鳥。【考證】已改正。

考證：〔【木華·海賦】鷸如〈敬下鳥〉鳧之失侶。〕　謹照原文〈敬下鳥〉鳧改驚鳧。

Basic explanation of words
snipe
yù

snipe
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yù］
["Guang Yun" Yu Lv cut, into the operation, to. ]
"鹬1" in traditional characters.
(1) The name of the waterfowl. The body color is dull, the bill is slender, the legs are also long, and there are no webs between the toes. He often lives in Tianze, preying on small fish and insects. It is a migratory bird. The sky will soon be raining.
(2) The alias of Kingfisher.
(3) Nowadays it is a general term for many species of Snipe. Sometimes it refers specifically to various birds of the genus Snipe. Common sandpipers, fine-billed sandpipers, black-footed sandpipers, three-toed sandpipers, and broad-billed sandpipers are common.
(4) Jifei appearance.
[②]［shù］
"鹬2" in traditional characters.
See "Snipe 2".
snipe
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Hai Collection] [Bird Character Department] 　鹬; Kangxi strokes: 23; Page number: page 1501 to 16
[Guang Yun] Yu Lu cut [Ji Yun] Yun Lu cut [Yun Hui] [Positive Rhyme] Cut with Lu,? Yin Yu. [Said the text] Snipe, knowing the sky will rain birds. Crested Sandpiper who knows astronomy. Chen Zangqi said: The snipe is like a quail, with a long beak in the mud. The villager said: The frog is transformed by the frog. [Warring States Policy] Su Qin said: Snipe and clam are holding each other. Another kingfisher is called the snipe. 【Erya·Shiniao】green sandpiper. 【Guo's Note】Like swallows, cyanotic, giving birth to Linlin. [Sparse] Li Xun said: Snipe, a Cui, whose feathers can be decorated. Another kind, barefoot, yellow text, said snipe. [Twenty-four years of Zuo Zhuan·Xi] Zheng Zizang is good at gathering the snipe crown, yes. Also 【Zhengyun】Flying appearance. 【Muhua·Haifu】The snipe is like a lost couple with a frightening mallard. Also 【Jiyun】Food rhythm cutting, sound technique. [Guang Ya] The harrier is also free from the cage. [Cao Xian's Note] Snipe sound. The word "Jing" was originally engraved from Jing Cong Niao. 【Verification】It has been corrected. Textual research: [[Muhua·Haifu] The snipe is like the lost couple of "Jingxianiao". 〔〕 　 I would like to change the original text "Respect for the Birds" to startle.
